top.description: The number of records displayed on a page.

TMV1-Filter.description:
The filter for retrieving a subset of the Kubernetes image occurences list. Include this parameter in every request that generates paginated output

Supported fields:
| Field        | Description                           |
| ------------ | ------------------------------------- |
| `clusterid`  | The ID of the Kubernetes cluster      |
| `imageid`    | The  The ID of the container image         |

Supported operators:
* `eq` - Operator "equal to"
* `and` - Operator "and"
* `or` - Operator "or"
* `not` - Operator "not"
* `()` - Symbols for grouping operands
